privateClassPropertyAccessibleWithinClass.ts(20,32): error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'null'.
privateClassPropertyAccessibleWithinClass.ts(26,17): error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'null'.


==== privateClassPropertyAccessibleWithinClass.ts (2 errors) ====
    // no errors
    
    class C {
        private x: string;
        private get y() { return this.x; }
        private set y(x) { this.y = this.x; }
        private foo() { return this.foo; }
    
        private static x: string;
        private static get y() { return this.x; }
        private static set y(x) { this.y = this.x; }
        private static foo() { return this.foo; }
        private static bar() { this.foo(); }
    }
    
    // added level of function nesting
    class C2 {
        private x: string;
        private get y() { () => this.x; return null; }
        private set y(x) { () => { this.y = this.x; } }
                                   ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'null'.
        private foo() { () => this.foo; }
    
        private static x: string;
        private static get y() { () => this.x; return null; }
        private static set y(x) {
            () => { this.y = this.x; }
                    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS2322: Type 'string' is not assignable to type 'null'.
         }
        private static foo() { () => this.foo; }
        private static bar() { () => this.foo(); }
    }
